00015 ComponentTreeModel::ComponentTreeModel(QSharedPointer<Component> component, 
00016                                                                            LibraryInterface* handler,
00017                                                                            QObject *parent):
00018 QAbstractItemModel(parent), 
00019 rootItem_(0), 
00020 component_(component),
00021 handler_(handler) {
00022 
00023     rootItem_ = new ComponentTreeItem(ComponentTreeItem::COMPONENT, component.data(),
00024                 component, handler_, 0);
00025 }
00026 
00027 ComponentTreeModel::~ComponentTreeModel() {
00028 
00029         delete rootItem_;
00030         rootItem_ = 0;
00031 }

00033 QModelIndex ComponentTreeModel::index(int row, int column,
00034                 const QModelIndex& parent) const {
00035 
00036         if (!hasIndex(row, column, parent)) {
00037                 return QModelIndex();
00038         }
00039 
00040         ComponentTreeItem* parentItem = 0;
00041 
00042         // if parent is invalid the asked index is for the root item
00043         if (!parent.isValid()) {
00044                 parentItem = rootItem_;
00045         }
00046         else {
00047                 parentItem = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00048                                 parent.internalPointer());
00049         }
00050 
00051         Q_ASSERT(parentItem);
00052 
00053         // get pointer to specified child of the parent
00054         ComponentTreeItem* child = parentItem->child(row);
00055 
00056         // if the item was found
00057         if (child) {
00058                 return createIndex(row, column, child);
00059         }
00060         // if child was not found
00061         else {
00062                 return QModelIndex();
00063         }
00064 }
00065 
00066 QModelIndex ComponentTreeModel::generalEditorIndex() const {
00067         // the general editor is the first child of the root item
00068         return index(0, 0, QModelIndex());
00069 }
00070 
00071 QModelIndex ComponentTreeModel::parent(const QModelIndex& index) const {
00072 
00073         // if the child parameter is invalid then invalid model index is
00074         // returned
00075         if (!index.isValid()) {
00076                 return QModelIndex();
00077         }
00078 
00079         // pointer to the child item
00080         ComponentTreeItem* childItem =
00081                         static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00082         ComponentTreeItem* parent = childItem->parent();
00083 
00084         // if the parent does not exist then this item is root item
00085         if (!parent) {
00086                 return QModelIndex();
00087         }
00088 
00089         // if row is invalid then the grandparent does not exist and parent is
00090         // a root item so we return an invalid QModelIndex
00091         int row = parent->row();
00092         if (row == -1) {
00093                 return QModelIndex();
00094         }
00095 
00096         // create new index and return it
00097         return createIndex(row, 0, parent);
00098 }
00099 
00100 int ComponentTreeModel::rowCount(const QModelIndex& parent) const {
00101 
00102         // only one column exists
00103         if (parent.column() > 0) {
00104                 return 0;
00105         }
00106 
00107         ComponentTreeItem* parentItem = 0;
00108 
00109         // if the given item is invalid, it is interpreted as root item
00110         if (!parent.isValid()) {
00111                 parentItem = rootItem_;
00112         }
00113         else {
00114                 parentItem = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00115                                 parent.internalPointer());
00116         }
00117 
00118         // return how many children the parent has
00119         return parentItem->rowCount();
00120 }
00121 
00122 int ComponentTreeModel::columnCount(const QModelIndex&) const {
00123 
00124         // the model only has one column
00125         return 1;
00126 }

00128 QVariant ComponentTreeModel::data(const QModelIndex& index, int role) const {
00129 
00130         if (!index.isValid()) {
00131                 return QVariant();
00132         }
00133 
00134         ComponentTreeItem* item = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00135                 index.internalPointer());
00136         Q_ASSERT_X(item, "ComponentTreeModel::data in Qt::DisplayRole",
00137                 "static_cast failed to give valid ComponentTreeItem-pointer");
00138 
00139         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00140                 return item->text();
00141         }
00142         else if (role == Qt::FontRole) {
00143                 return item->getFont();
00144         }
00145         else if (role == Qt::ForegroundRole) {
00146                 if (item->isValid())
00147                         return QColor("black");
00148                 else
00149                         return QColor("red");
00150         }
00151         // not supported role
00152         else {
00153                 return QVariant();
00154         }
00155 }

00158 bool ComponentTreeModel::hasChildren(const QModelIndex& parent) const {
00159         
00160         // if parent is invalid then it is root and it always has children
00161         if (!parent.isValid()) {
00162                 return true;
00163         }
00164 
00165         ComponentTreeItem* item = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00166                 parent.internalPointer());
00167         Q_ASSERT_X(item, "ComponentTreeModel::hasChildren",
00168                 "static_cast failed to give valid ComponentTreeItem-pointer");
00169 
00170         return item->hasChildren();
00171 }

00174 Qt::ItemFlags ComponentTreeModel::flags(const QModelIndex& index) const {
00175 
00176         if (!index.isValid()) {
00177                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00178         }
00179 
00180         return Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable;
00181 }

00183 QVariant ComponentTreeModel::headerData(int section,
00184                 Qt::Orientation orientation, int role) const {
00185 
00186         if (section != 0 || orientation != Qt::Horizontal ||
00187                         role != Qt::DisplayRole) {
00188                 return QVariant();

00194 void ComponentTreeModel::setItemName( const QString newName, 
00195                                                                          const QModelIndex& index )
00196 {
00197         // do nothing for invalid indexes.
00198         if (!index.isValid()) {
00199                 return;
00200         }
00201 
00202         // get pointer to the correct item
00203         ComponentTreeItem* item = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00204                 index.internalPointer());
00205         Q_ASSERT_X(item, "ComponentTreeModel::setItemName",
00206                 "static_cast failed to give valid ComponentTreeItem-pointer");
00207 
00208         // change the text
00209         item->setText(newName);
00210 
00211         // inform the view of the changes.
00212         emit dataChanged(index, index);
00213 
00214 }

00216 void ComponentTreeModel::updateItem( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00217         emit dataChanged(index, index);
00218 }

00220 void ComponentTreeModel::removeItem( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00221         
00222         // if item's parent is invalid then the item is one of the item's in first
00223         // hierarchy level in tree and the item can't be removed
00224         QModelIndex parent = ComponentTreeModel::parent(index);
00225         if (!parent.isValid())  {
00226                 return;
00227         }
00228 
00229         ComponentTreeItem* childItem = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00230                 index.internalPointer());
00231         Q_ASSERT_X(childItem, "ComponentTreeModel::removeItem",
00232                 "static_cast failed to give valid ComponentTreeItem-pointer for child");
00233 
00234         // if the type of the item is one of the types that doesn't have an editor
00235         // then it can't be removed directly, also GENERAL editor is never removed.
00236         if (!childItem->getDataPointer() || 
00237                 childItem->type() == ComponentTreeItem::GENERAL) {
00238                 return;
00239         }
00240 
00241         ComponentTreeItem* parentItem = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00242                 parent.internalPointer());
00243         Q_ASSERT_X(parentItem, "ComponentTreeModel::removeItem",
00244                 "static_cast failed to give valid ComponentTreeItem-pointer for parent");
00245 
00246         int childNumber = parentItem->getIndexOf(childItem);
00247         Q_ASSERT_X(childNumber >= 0, "ComponentTreeModel::removeItem",
00248                 "The child did not belong to the parent");
00249 
00250         beginRemoveRows(parent, childNumber, childNumber);
00251         parentItem->removeChild(childItem);
00252         endRemoveRows();
00253 
00254 
00255 }
00256 
00257 QModelIndex ComponentTreeModel::createChild( const QModelIndex& parent ) {
00258 
00259         if (!parent.isValid()) {
00260                 return QModelIndex();
00261         }
00262 
00263         ComponentTreeItem* parentItem = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00264                 parent.internalPointer());
00265         Q_ASSERT_X(parentItem, "ComponentTreeModel::createChild",
00266                 "static_cast failed to give valid ComponentTreeItem-pointer");
00267 
00268         // if parentItem can't have children then don't create anything and
00269         // return an invalid model index
00270         if (!parentItem->canHaveChildren()) {
00271                 return QModelIndex();
00272         }
00273 
00274         int addedIndex = parentItem->rowCount();
00275 
00276         beginInsertRows(parent, addedIndex, addedIndex);
00277         parentItem->createChild();
00278         endInsertRows();
00279 
00280         // return the model index of created child
00281         return index(addedIndex, 0, parent);
00282 }
00283 
00284 void ComponentTreeModel::moveItem( const QModelIndex& source, const QModelIndex& target) {
00285 
00286         // invalid indexes can't be moved
00287         if (!source.isValid() || !target.isValid())
00288                 return;
00289 
00290         // source is set on top of the target in this case the location would not change.
00291 //      else if (source.row() + 1 == target.row())
00292 //              return;
00293 
00294         QModelIndex parentIndex = parent(source);
00295         if (!parentIndex.isValid())
00296                 return;
00297 
00298         int targetIndex = target.row();
00299         if (target.row() > source.row())
00300                 ++targetIndex;
00301 
00302         ComponentTreeItem* parent = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(parentIndex.internalPointer());
00303 
00304         beginMoveRows(parentIndex, source.row(), source.row(), parentIndex, targetIndex);
00305         parent->moveChild(source.row(), targetIndex);
00306         endMoveRows();
00307 
00308         emit itemMoved();
00309 }
